channel.title: 508 questions
channel.description:
hey i got some questions:
How do i make someone mod / admin / owner/co-owner.
Is there an command like :;master or something?
-Thanks in advance. I dont know which base but it has ::food ::runes ::armor and all that commands.. SO its like an standart 508 isnt it?

item.title: 508 questions
item.dc:creator: @glabay glabay
item.description:
@glabay wrote:

[quote=“jarnohhh, post:1, topic:251008”]hey i got some questions:

How do i make someone mod / admin / owner/co-owner.

Is there an command like :;master or something?

-Thanks in advance. I dont know which base but it has ::food ::runes ::armor and all that commands… SO its like an standart 508 isnt it?[/quote]

to make someone mod, admin, or what ever by the login got into Login.java found in the file “io”

this is a rough way of doing it may need to edit but you get the idea

if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("glabay")) {
p.rights = 2;
}

that gives admin, just change the name and the rights.

0 = Player
1 = Player Moderator
2 = Admin/owner
3+ = Hidden

or go into your .dat files, and look for rights, and change it that way

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Phatt Phatt
item.description:
@Phatt wrote:

Yes there is, you can make poeople Mod/Admin though Login.java

Commands can be found in commands.java
